results.title: VM Engineer with vRO, vRA experience
QA Automation
Food Service Assistant Per Diem
results.company: Action for a Better Community, Inc.
results.description: <p style="margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; text-align: center;"><b><u>Job Vacancy</u></b></p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">  </p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b>Program:</b> Head Start</p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b>Location:</b> To be determined</p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b>Position: Food Service Assistant</b></p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b>Hours:</b> <b>Per Diem</b></p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b>Salary Range:</b> $11.61 - $12.23/hour</p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b>Salary Grade: 15</b> .</p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">  </p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"> </p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b><u>Summary of Responsibilities:</u></b></p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">Prepare breakfast, snack and cold food items for lunch services. Maintain </p> <p style="margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">equipment and storage areas. Follow sanitation and safety requirements as outlined by the N.Y.S. Department of Health. Report to additional centers to assist with snacks, clean-up and other duties as assigned by supervisor.</p> <p style="margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">  </p> <p style="margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b><u>Qualifications</u></b></p> <u> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">High School Diploma or GED and one year experience working in pre-school or institutional kitchen, cooking experience preferred</li> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">Requires a working level knowledge in food service and preparations, including storage of food and related, supplies, and food sanitation and safety</li> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">Requires organizational, planning, oral and written communication skills</li> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">Requires the health and physical capability to work in kitchen, bend, lift and/or move up to 40lbs., and ability to be on feet for upwards of three hours at a time</li> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">Ability to receive clearance from NYS Central Registry</li> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">Must possess and maintain a valid driver's license and access to reliable transportation</li> <li style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b><i><u>All employees of ABC Early Childhood Services Division must receive and maintain a full clearance from the Justice Center of New York and the Office of Children and Family Services that allows them unsupervised contact with children. Any prospective or current employee who has an indication of child abuse maltreatment or neglect, or who cannot be left unsupervised with children, will not be hired or retained</u></i></b>.</li> </ul> <p style="margin-left:1.0in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt"><b> ****This position is subject to the collective bargaining agreement****</b></p> <p style="margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">  </p> <p style="margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">  </p> <p style="margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt">  </p>
